name: Winterclaw
description:
Winterclaw is an immersive dark fantasy sim with an in-depth companion.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After being saved from dying in the frozen snow, you must help build the city of Winterclaw back to its former glory.

Features include, Earn money daily from upgrading the city, day commodity exchange, or Land Income.

Buy stock and land to earn money to buy upgrades for the city and outfits for the leader.

What wish will be granted once you succeed?

Discover the fire within and survive the cold.
